story_stone_01_01000/2401_1201_0100_10:
Do you remember the fascinating stone Rei found
at the ruins?
story_stone_01_01000/2401_1201_0200_10: I asked Professor Bellis to analyze it.
story_stone_01_01000/2401_1201_0300_10:
The stone that has a similar glow to a sync
stone, right?
story_stone_01_01000/2401_1201_0500_10: Yes, she has some interesting results.
story_stone_01_01000/2401_1201_0600_10:
I want you to come with me to her lab, so we
can hear more details.
story_stone_01_01000/2401_1201_0700_10:
Sure, of course! I’ve actually been thinking about it
for a while...
story_stone_01_01000/2401_1201_1000_10: Now, let’s hurry to Professor Bellis’s lab!
